LanguageData.Bullet_Scraptooth.label: scraptooth bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Scraptooth.label: feral scraptooth
LanguageData.Gun_Scraptooth.description: Improvised pistols, manufactured by ferals. Stronger and faster than normal pistol, scraptooth has lower accuracy and range.
LanguageData.Bullet_ScatterStick.label: shrapnel
LanguageData.Gun_ScatterStick.label: feral scatter stick
LanguageData.Gun_ScatterStick.description: Improvised muzzleloader shotgun. Deadly, but extremely short range and long reload.
LanguageData.Bullet_Thrasher.label: thrasher bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Thrasher.label: feral thrasher
LanguageData.Gun_Thrasher.description: Improvised assault rifle with crude fire mechanism. High firepower, shorter range.
LanguageData.Bullet_Crucifier.label: harpoon
LanguageData.Gun_Crucifier.label: feral crucifier
LanguageData.Gun_Crucifier.description: Electric harpoon gun. Slow charge rate, long range, impressive fire power.
LanguageData.Bullet_Deathdealer.label: deathdealer bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Deathdealer.label: feral deathdealer
LanguageData.Gun_Deathdealer.description: The Deathdealer is a crude improvised SMG. lethal in close quarters and features a high magazine capacity.
LanguageData.Bullet_Gnasher.label: gnasher nail
LanguageData.Gun_Gnasher.label: feral gnasher
LanguageData.Gun_Gnasher.description: Heavily modified nailgun. Shoots at a very high rate of fire, but is very inaccurate and does only little damage.
LanguageData.Bullet_Scorcher.label: napalm
LanguageData.Gun_Scorcher.label: feral scorcher
LanguageData.Bullet_Thumper.label: rocket
LanguageData.Gun_Thumper.label: feral thumper
LanguageData.Gun_Thumper.description: A simple single-use makeshift rocket launcher.
LanguageData.Bullet_RatStick.label: rat stick
LanguageData.Gun_RatStick.label: feral rat sticks
LanguageData.Gun_RatStick.description: Javelins tied with explosive boomrat tumor.
